sourcesContent:
<ion-header>
  <ion-toolbar color="secondary">
    <ion-title>
      Editar Item
    </ion-title>
    <ion-buttons slot="end"> 
      <ion-button (click)="addItem()"> 
        <ion-icon name="add-outline"></ion-icon>
      </ion-button>
    </ion-buttons>
  </ion-toolbar>
</ion-header>

<ion-content>
  <ion-item>
    <ion-label position="floating">Título</ion-label>
    <ion-input [(ngModel)]="originalItem.title" type="text"></ion-input>
  </ion-item>
  <ion-item>
    <ion-label position="floating">Descrição</ion-label>
    <ion-textarea [(ngModel)]="originalItem.description"></ion-textarea>
  </ion-item>
</ion-content>
